subrequest.title: Subrequest
subrequest.description: Contains all the necessary information to make the request.

action.title: Action
action.description: The action intended for the request. Each action can resolve into a different HTTP method.

uri.title: URI
uri.description: The URI where to make the subrequest.

requestId.title: Request ID
requestId.description: ID other requests can use to reference this request.

body.title: Body
body.description: The JSON encoded body payload for HTTP requests send a body.

headers.title: Headers
headers.description: HTTP headers to be sent with the request.

waitFor.title: Parent ID
waitFor.description: ID of other requests that this request depends on.

items.description: ID of another request that is a dependency for this one.
